Drusus first began politics with the office of quaestor in AD 10 and was very popular among the Roman people.Cassius Dio, Roman History, LVII.14 Drusus died suddenly 14 September 23, from natural causes. ==References== Category:10s BC births Category:23 deaths Category:Roman people
